New Records: Moeen Ali's all-round performance including 63 runs and 2 wickets; England's total of 193 runs in 20 overs; 80 sixes hit in the series, surpassing the 2019 England vs New Zealand record; Nicholas Pooran's 111-meter six
Key Match Events: Moeen Ali's Man-of-the-Match performance; Kyle Mayers and Brandon King's opening stand of 64; England's late momentum with 65-run partnership between Moeen Ali and Liam Livingstone; Jason Holder's counter-attacking 47-run stand; Kyle Mayers' 23-ball cameo; Nicholas Pooran's 22-run knock with a record-breaking six
Pre-Game Insights: The series was level 2-2 before the match; Anticipation of an exciting grand finale; High crowd support creating a carnival atmosphere; England's strategy to chase a target of 194 runs
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies captain Kieron Pollard's comments on the loss and the series outcome; England's dominance in the late innings; The series being a pivotal moment in their playoff push
